title: Insider Threat Cyber Forensics
description: An analyst must investigate suspicious network activity from an insider's account, including large data transfers to an external device.

tasks.description: Review the user's network activity logs, focusing on file access and data transfers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies large volumes of classified data being accessed and transferred.

tasks.description: Correlate the network logs with physical security logs to see if the user connected a USB device at the time of the transfer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds a log entry showing the user connected a personal USB drive.

tasks.description: Compile a forensic report with the evidence and escalate to counterintelligence for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a detailed report to support a formal insider threat investigation.
